title: Creative Director
description: Lead the creative vision, direction, and execution across branding, digital marketing, design, and AI-driven creative projects. This role demands strategic thinking, storytelling excellence, and hands-on leadership.
responsibilities: Oversee creative strategy, concept development, and campaign design for digital, branding, and integrated marketing projects
Lead the creative team—designers, writers, strategists—in producing compelling assets and experiences
Translate brand goals and client objectives into high-impact ideas and visual narratives
Ensure consistency of brand voice, visual identity, and creative excellence across all deliverables
Collaborate with strategy, marketing, performance, and UI/UX teams to drive integrated creative solutions
Present creative concepts and pitches to clients, leadership, and partners with clarity and impact
Inspire, mentor, and guide teams while fostering a high-performance, innovation-driven culture
Stay updated with design trends, AI creative tools, digital platforms, and new-age storytelling techniques
Oversee multi-project timelines, prioritization, and reviews to ensure high-quality, timely deliverables
requirements: 7–9 years of experience in advertising, digital marketing, or creative agencies
Exceptional communication, presentation, and storytelling skills
Strong leadership and team management abilities with a collaborative mindset
Expertise in creative direction, branding, digital campaigns, and visual communication
Ability to think conceptually while executing with precision and creativity
Familiarity with AI-accelerated creative tools and modern digital design methods
niceToHave: Additional qualifications in Design from IID or similar reputed design institutions
Experience in next-generation AI + digital design workflows
Hands-on involvement in branding, motion design, and campaign ideation
benefits: A leadership opportunity to shape the agency's creative direction
Access to cutting-edge AI, design, and marketing technologies
High-impact work across multiple brands and digital environments
Competitive compensation and high-growth career trajectory
A creative, open, and innovation-led work environment

title: Graphics Designer
description: Create compelling visual assets for branding, digital campaigns, websites, social media, and AI-enhanced creative deliverables. Leverage AI acceleration tools to produce high-quality work efficiently.
responsibilities: Design graphics, layouts, social creatives, branding assets, and digital campaign visuals
Use AI-based tools to streamline and enhance creative output, including ideation, rendering, and variation generation
Collaborate with Creative Directors, UI/UX designers, copywriters, and marketing teams
Interpret briefs and translate them into visually engaging assets with speed and precision
Maintain brand consistency across all creative materials
Work on multiple projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines and quality standards
Explore new styles, techniques, and AI-powered innovations to improve creative workflows
requirements: 2–5 years of experience in graphic design across digital and social ecosystems
Strong portfolio demonstrating design fundamentals, creativity, and versatility
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, Canva, and AI creative tools
Ability to understand brand guidelines and convert them into powerful visual stories
Strong attention to detail and a passion for modern digital aesthetics
Eagerness to learn, adapt, and grow in an AI-first creative environment
niceToHave: Design certifications or coursework are a plus
Experience using AI tools such as Midjourney, Adobe Firefly, Runway, or similar
Exposure to motion graphics or short-form video content
benefits: The opportunity to work with global brands in an AI-accelerated creative setup
Growth-oriented environment with diverse projects and continuous learning

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design outstanding digital experiences across applications, DXPs, websites, landing pages, and mobile interfaces. Blend research, user psychology, visual design, and prototyping to create intuitive, high-performing digital journeys.
responsibilities: Design user flows, wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity UI for web and mobile platforms
Conduct UX research, competitor analysis, and user testing to validate design decisions
Collaborate with product, development, and marketing teams to build seamless experiences
Create responsive, accessible, and scalable design systems
Work on DXPs, websites, apps, and landing pages with a strong conversion and usability focus
Leverage AI tools to accelerate UX workflows, insights, and UI generation
Present design concepts and rationale to stakeholders clearly and confidently
Ensure visual consistency and usability across digital touchpoints
requirements: 4–7 years of experience in UX/UI design for apps, websites, and digital platforms
Strong portfolio demonstrating UX thinking, UI craft, and interaction design
Proficiency in Figma, Adobe XD, Webflow (optional), and prototyping tools
Understanding of DXP structures, component libraries, and responsive design principles
Strong analytical and problem-solving mindset with design thinking orientation
Ability to balance aesthetics with functionality and business goals
niceToHave: Certifications in UX/UI, HCI, or digital design are a plus
Experience in Webflow, Framer, or no-code design tools
Familiarity with AI-based UX research and UI automation tools
benefits: Work on next-generation digital experience platforms and modern product design
Exposure to global brands and enterprise-level digital ecosystems
Creative freedom, learning opportunities, and career advancement
Competitive compensation and a collaborative, future-ready environment
